title: Add Support for New Sensor Protocols
summary: Implement support for additional sensor protocols to enhance device compatibility. This PR focuses on updating the device layer to recognize and process data from newly identified sensor types.

review_states.comment: The device layer updates look solid and recognize the new protocols well. However, the unit tests don't cover all the new sensor protocols. Please add those tests.
Great work on the implementation! The documentation needs more detail on the new protocols supported. Please expand on that section.

title: Initialize RESTful API Framework
summary: Set up the foundational structure for the RESTful API framework, including necessary libraries and configurations to support API development.

review_states.comment: The project structure looks solid and the libraries are well-chosen and configured. Nice work on that front! Once you add the basic GET endpoint, it should meet all the acceptance criteria.
The setup is clean and organized. However, the server setup doesn't handle HTTP requests yet. Please include a basic endpoint for testing.

title: Implement JWT Token Generation and Validation
summary: This PR introduces the functionality to generate and validate JWT tokens for user authentication. It includes the creation of a utility module for handling JWT operations such as token creation, signing, and verification.

review_states.comment: The JWT token generation and validation look solid. However, please update the documentation with usage instructions for the JWT utility.
The core functionality is in place, but please add unit tests for edge cases like token expiration and invalid signatures to ensure robustness.

title: Implement Hardware Compatibility Check Module
summary: Develop a module to perform hardware compatibility checks, ensuring devices meet the necessary requirements for running EF_AIX. This includes checking for supported sensor types and necessary hardware specifications.

review_states.comment: The module accurately identifies hardware compatibility based on the criteria we discussed. The user documentation is clear and provides good instructions on using the module. LGTM, approved!
Integration tests look solid and everything passes across different hardware setups. The documentation is spot on and covers all the bases. LGTM, approved!

title: Implement User Authentication Endpoints
summary: Develop endpoints for user authentication, including login and registration functionalities, to secure the API.

review_states.comment: The endpoints for login and registration look solid, and I appreciate the use of bcrypt for password hashing. However, the token validation logic needs revision as it doesn't handle expired tokens correctly. Please address this issue.

I agree with the feedback on the token validation logic. Additionally, please add more unit tests for the token generation and validation process to ensure everything works as expected. Great job on securing the user data!

title: Integrate JWT Authentication into User Login Flow
summary: This PR integrates JWT authentication into the existing user login flow. It modifies the login endpoint to issue a JWT token upon successful authentication and updates the client-side to handle token storage.

review_states.comment: The JWT token issuance looks solid, and the client-side handles token storage securely. I ran the tests, and they all pass. Great job on updating them to verify JWT issuance. LGTM, approved! üéâ
The changes to the login tests are comprehensive, and the updated documentation is appreciated. Everything seems to be in order. LGTM, approved! üöÄ

title: Update Device Layer for Enhanced Protocol Handling
summary: Refactor the device layer to improve handling of various communication protocols, ensuring seamless integration with a wider range of devices.

review_states.comment: The refactor looks solid in terms of handling multiple communication protocols. However, there is a slight degradation in processing speed, particularly in the protocol switching section. Please optimize this area for better performance.
I agree with the need for performance optimization. Additionally, please improve coding standards, especially around variable naming and comments, to align with our best practices.

title: Implement Middleware for JWT Token Verification
summary: This PR adds middleware to verify JWT tokens for protected routes. It ensures that only requests with valid tokens can access certain endpoints, enhancing security.

review_states.comment: The middleware correctly identifies and rejects requests with invalid or missing JWT tokens. Nice work on that! The unit tests are comprehensive and cover all edge cases. LGTM, approved! üéâ

The protected routes are only accessible with a valid JWT token, which is exactly what we need. The unit tests are solid, and the documentation is updated to list the protected routes and their requirements. Everything seems to be in order. LGTM! Approved! üöÄ

Everything checks out from my end. The JWT integration is seamless, the tests are thorough, and the documentation is spot on. Well done!
